title: Fugitive accused of stealing the life savings of North Carolina widow captured in south Alabama
text:
Published By: Al.com: Montgomery - Today 
A fugitive wanted for burglarizing the home of an elderly North Carolina widow was apprehended near Dothan on Wednesday, according to U.S. M...
